metadata.title: CVE-2018-18358 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Lack of special casing of localhost in WPAD files in Google Chrome prior to71.0.3578.80 allowed an attacker on the local network segment to proxyresources on localhost via a crafted WPAD file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
